alert.note: Alert for Hancock; McDonough; Putnam (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 01 at 10:15AM CST until February 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Putnam, Hancock, and McDonough Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Strong north winds between 15-25 mph may cause blowing and drifting of snow, especially on east west roads. These hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute on Wednesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 for Iowa, or by visiting 511ia.org, modot.org, or idot.Illinois.gov.
